casebody.data:
Shrenik B. BAVISHI, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Sam ALADABBAGH d/b/a Diamond Inn, Defendant. C-682 September Term 2017
080431 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 26, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001397-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the notice of appeal is dismissed.
